content:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/verify-build-artifacts.yml"]
Updated CI workflow to run verify_build_artifacts.py after the build step so runs fail loudly when auditable artifacts are missing or empty.
